wikipedia_page.main: George Husband Baird FRSE FSAScot (13 July 1761 – 14 January 1840) was a Scottish minister, educational reformer, linguist and the Principal of the University of Edinburgh from 1793 to 1840. In 1800 he served as Moderator of the Church of Scotland General Assembly.

response: * George Husband Baird (1761–1840), minister, educational reformer, linguist and Principal of the University of Edinburgh
*Rev George Husband Baird (1761–1840) principal of the University of Edinburgh
